revised_title: Dynamics of SU(3) Monopoles: Spectral Curves and Geodesic Flow
tldr: The authors study the dynamics of monopoles with minimal symmetry breaking using geodesic flow on a totally geodesic submanifold of a moduli space of solutions to Nahm's equations. They analyze the metric on this submanifold and numerically integrate the resulting geodesic equations, providing a physical interpretation of the geodesics. The study focuses on monopoles with SU(3) symmetry and their spectral curves.
